mapper.sql: id, course_base_id as courseBaseId, custom as custom, course_type1 as courseType1, course_type2 as courseType2, course_type3 as courseType3, create_time as createTime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_course_manage ( course_base_id, custom, course_type1, course_type2, course_type3, create_time ) VALUES ( #{courseBaseId}, #{custom}, #{courseType1}, #{courseType2}, #{courseType3}, #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_course_manage
course_base_id = #{courseBaseId},
custom = #{custom},
course_type1 = #{courseType1},
course_type2 = #{courseType2},
course_type3 = #{courseType3},
create_time=#{createTime}
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_course_manage
course_base_id = #{map.courseBaseId},
custom = #{map.custom},
course_type1 = #{map.courseType1},
course_type2 = #{map.courseType2},
course_type3 = #{map.courseType3},
create_time=#{map.createTime}
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_course_manage ( course_base_id, custom, course_type1, course_type2, course_type3, create_time ) VALUES ( #{map.courseBaseId}, #{map.custom}, #{map.courseType1}, #{map.courseType2}, #{map.courseType3}, #{map.createTime} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM saas_course_manage
AND course_base_id = #{courseBaseId},
AND custom = #{custom},
AND course_type1 = #{courseType1},
AND course_type2 = #{courseType2},
AND course_type3 = #{courseType3},
AND create_time=#{createTime}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_course_manage
AND course_base_id like CONCAT('%', #{courseBaseId} , '%')
AND custom like CONCAT('%', #{custom} , '%')
AND course_type1 like CONCAT('%', #{courseType1} , '%')
AND course_type2 like CONCAT('%', #{courseType2} , '%')
AND course_type3 like CONCAT('%', #{courseType3} , '%')
AND createTime like CONCAT('%', #{createTime} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
